cpg
***


Description
===========

CLI for managing cluster placement groups.


Available Commands
==================

* cluster-placement-group

  * activate

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * deactivate

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* work-request

  * cancel

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list
